metadata.dcterms:title: Mixed Methods Search Filters December 2016
metadata.dcterms:creator: Slater, Linda
metadata.dcterms:description: Provides search filters to retrieve mixed methods studies from Ovid, EBSCO, ProQuest and Web of Sciences databases as well as the Scopus database.
